Items.name: sword
Items.lv5Effect:
Damage +50%
Sword strike size +50%
Sword strike spawns sword waves

Items.name: dagger
Items.description: Throw daggers at surrounding enemies damaging the first enemy hit with the dagger
Items.lv5Effect:
Damage +25%
Number of daggers +2
Cooldown -1s
Daggers can pierce through multiple enemies

Items.name: field
Items.description: Spawns a magic field around the player. Enemies inside the field will take damage every second
Items.lv5Effect:
Damage +25%
Field size +25%
Enemies inside the field are slowed by 25%

Items.name: arrow
Items.description: Fires an arrow in the target direction dealing damage to any enemies it passes through
Items.lv5Effect:
Damage +25%
Cooldown -1s
Enemies hit are slowed by 50% for 1s

Items.name: fireball
Items.description: Summon fireballs from the sky striking the enemies closest to the player
Items.lv5Effect:
Damage +25%
Cooldown -1s
Spawns an additional firebal
Fireball leaves a blazing field that burns the enemy

Items.name: hammer
Items.description: Swing a hammer at the closest enemy damaging and knocking back enemies hit
Items.lv5Effect: Hammer now swings permanently around the player

Items.name: bolt
Items.description: Fires a magic bolt repeatedly at the closest enemy dealing damage to the first enemy hit
Items.lv5Effect:
Damage +25%
Cooldown -0.1s
Upon hitting an enemy, the bolt will explode causing damage to surrounding enemies
